MS MCQs

    Control file and folder handling in Power Automate Desktop

    »

    1. With which action is it possible to extract the root path, directory, file name, or extension of a file?

      Get Special Folder action

      Get Files in Folder action

      Get filepath part action

      If File(s) Exists action


    2. Which one of the following statements is true about the Get Files in Folder action?

      It can retrieve the files that a specified folder and its subfolders contain.

      It can retrieve only the files that a specified folder contains.


    3. Which one of the following actions can you use to get the desktop directory of the current user?

      Create Folder

      Get Subfolders in Folder

      Get Files in Folder

      Get Special Folder


    4. Which one of the following statements is true about the Copy File(s) action?

      It copies the files, and then it removes them from their original location.

      It copies the files without removing them from their original location.
